d <- tbl_Phenology_Species %>%
  # convert to 5 m plot values
  select(Event_ID, Species_Code, starts_with("Plot")) %>%
  gather(plot_col, plot_val, -Event_ID, -Species_Code) %>%
  filter(plot_col != "Plot_7") %>%
  left_join(
    tlu_Richness,
    by = c("plot_val"="Richness_code")) %>%
  mutate(
    plot_num    = str_sub(plot_col, 6,6),
    plot_length = ifelse(nchar(plot_col) == 6, "5m", "1m")) %>%
  group_by(Event_ID, Species_Code, plot_num) %>%
  summarize(
    present = max(Analysis_value)) %>%
  # summarize by transect, ie all plots
  group_by(Event_ID, Species_Code) %>%
  summarize(
    present = max(present)) %>%
  # filter by year
  left_join(
    tbl_Events %>%
      mutate(
        date = as.Date(Start_Date, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")), 
    by="Event_ID") %>%
  filter(
    year(date) == year) %>%
  # get species nativity, life form, by park
  left_join(
    tlu_Project_Taxa %>%
      select(Species_Code=Species_code, Native, Layer) %>%
      left_join(
        tlu_Layer %>%
          select(Layer=Layer_code, Life_Form=Layer_desc),
        by="Layer"),
    by="Species_Code") %>%
  # get vegetation community
  left_join(
    tbl_Locations %>%
      select(Location_ID, Vegetation_Community),
    by="Location_ID") %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(Event_ID, Species_Code, Native, Life_Form, Vegetation_Community)

calc_spp_R <- function(tbl, v_life_form="All", v_nativity="All", v_community="All"){
  tbl %>%
    summarize(
      spp_R = n_distinct(.data$Species_Code)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    summarize(
      spp_R_mean = mean(spp_R),
      spp_R_sd   = sd(spp_R),
      spp_R_min  = min(spp_R),
      spp_R_max  = max(spp_R)) %>%
    mutate(
      life_form = v_life_form,
      nativity  = v_nativity,
      community = v_community)
}

# custom calculation function
calc_spp_mean <- function(pivotCalculator, netFilters, format, baseValues, cell) {
  d <- pivotCalculator$getDataFrame("d")
  d_f <- pivotCalculator$getFilteredDataFrame(d, netFilters)
  v <- d_f %>%
    group_by(Event_ID) %>%
    summarise(n_spp = n_distinct(Species_Code)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    summarize(
      v = mean(n_spp)) %>%
    pull(v)
  #v <- ifelse(is.nan(v), 0, v)
  #browser()
  list(
    rawValue = v, 
    formattedValue = ifelse(is.nan(v), "", pivotCalculator$formatValue(v, format=format)))
}

calc_spp_sd <- function(pivotCalculator, netFilters, format, baseValues, cell) {
  d <- pivotCalculator$getDataFrame("d")
  d_f <- pivotCalculator$getFilteredDataFrame(d, netFilters)
  v <- d_f %>%
    group_by(Event_ID) %>%
    summarise(n_spp = n_distinct(Species_Code)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    summarize(
      v = sd(n_spp)) %>%
    pull(v)
  list(
    rawValue = v, 
    formattedValue = ifelse(is.nan(v), "", pivotCalculator$formatValue(v, format=format)))
}

calc_spp_min <- function(pivotCalculator, netFilters, format, baseValues, cell) {
  d <- pivotCalculator$getDataFrame("d")
  d_f <- pivotCalculator$getFilteredDataFrame(d, netFilters)
  v <- d_f %>%
    group_by(Event_ID) %>%
    summarise(n_spp = n_distinct(Species_Code)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    summarize(
      v = min(n_spp)) %>%
    pull(v)
  list(
    rawValue = v, 
    formattedValue = ifelse(is.nan(v) | is.infinite(v), "", pivotCalculator$formatValue(v, format=format)))
}

calc_spp_max <- function(pivotCalculator, netFilters, format, baseValues, cell) {
  d <- pivotCalculator$getDataFrame("d")
  d_f <- pivotCalculator$getFilteredDataFrame(d, netFilters)
  v <- d_f %>%
    group_by(Event_ID) %>%
    summarise(n_spp = n_distinct(Species_Code)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    summarize(
      v = max(n_spp)) %>%
    pull(v)
  list(
    rawValue = v, 
    formattedValue = ifelse(is.nan(v) | is.infinite(v), "", pivotCalculator$formatValue(v, format=format)))
}

# create the pivot table
pt <- PivotTable$new()
pt$addData(d, "d")
pt$addRowDataGroups("Life_Form", totalCaption="All")
pt$addRowDataGroups("Native", totalCaption="All")
pt$addColumnDataGroups("Vegetation_Community", totalCaption="All")
pt$defineCalculation(
  calculationName="mean_n_spp", caption="mean", calculationFunction=calc_spp_mean,
  format="%.1f", noDataCaption="", type="function") # noDataValue=0, 
pt$defineCalculation(
  calculationName="mean_sd_spp", caption="sd", calculationFunction=calc_spp_sd,
  format="%.1f", type="function")
pt$defineCalculation(
  calculationName="mean_sd_min", caption="min", calculationFunction=calc_spp_min,
  format="%.1f", type="function")
pt$defineCalculation(
  calculationName="mean_sd_max", caption="max", calculationFunction=calc_spp_max,
  format="%.1f", type="function")
pt$renderPivot()
